body:
Futaf*gs salty,it tastes sweet.
Poison was never a futa originally,she and Roxy were designed as women gang members.
The futa garbage theory comes from the time where Nintendo censored Final Fight on the SNES by changing both Poison and Roxy into two guys called Billy and Sid because Nintendo though that "a man beating up women in the street" was bad.
Booooo, Poison without dick is trash.
Poison without a dick, this is pretty rare.
Blasphemy. Poison does not have bagina. Poison have benis
